macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: S&P 500 Closes Slightly Lower at 6896 Amid Low Volume
items.summary: The S&P 500 ended down 9 points at 6896 on 3.3 billion shares traded, with 53% of intraday volume higher but 51% of stocks closing lower. Market outlook for Wednesday, December 31, 2025, points to a neutral to lower close.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Crypto Market Rises 0.5% to $3.08 Trillion Amid Mixed Top Coin Performances
items.summary: Total cryptocurrency market capitalization increased 0.5% over the past 24 hours to about $3.08 trillion. Ethereum slipped 0.3% to $2,973, Solana gained 1.1% to $126.1, while Dogecoin fell 1.2% to $0.123; smaller tokens like Omni Network surged over 170% to $3.39.

items.title: US Spot Bitcoin ETFs Record $355M Inflows, Ending Outflow Streak
items.summary: US spot Bitcoin ETFs saw $355.02 million in net inflows on Tuesday, lifting cumulative inflows to $56.96 billion despite December's selling pressure. Ether ETFs also posted $67.84 million inflows, ending a four-day outflow trend with cumulative inflows at $12.40 billion.

items.title: Cypherpunk Technologies Boosts Zcash Holdings Amid Privacy Coin Debate
items.summary: Cypherpunk Technologies deepened its investment in Zcash, sparking debate on privacy-focused cryptocurrencies' role in corporate treasuries like Bitcoin, as Zcash slipped 2.2% to $524.6.

items.title: Bitcoin's 2025 Bull Run Forward-Loaded Before Flash Crash Disruption
items.summary: Bitcoin's 2025 bull run was forward-loaded and then collapsed due to a flash crash, highlighting ongoing volatility and unpredictability in digital asset trading despite growing institutional acceptance.

items.title: XRP and Solana Exhibited Twice the Volatility of Bitcoin in 2025
items.summary: XRP and Solana experienced volatility in 2025 that was twice as intense as Bitcoin's, underscoring a bumpier ride for these altcoins compared to the leading cryptocurrency.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Over 50% of New Web Articles Now AI-Generated
items.summary: A study by digital marketing firm Graphite reveals that more than half of new articles on the internet are written by AI, blurring the line between human and machine authorship. This trend raises concerns about AI models trained on increasingly AI-generated data, potentially hindering future improvements.

items.title: China's DeepSeek AI Release Triggers Market Panic and Pushes Transparency
items.summary: The launch of China's DeepSeek AI software caused a stock market panic and trillion-dollar losses, accelerating industry shifts toward transparent 'chain of thought' models like 'AI MRI'. It forced competitors like OpenAI to enhance model explainability.

items.title: Stanford-Carnegie Study: Hybrid AI-Human Teams Outperform Autonomous AI by 68.7%
items.summary: New research from Stanford and Carnegie Mellon shows hybrid AI-human teams surpass fully autonomous AI agents by 68.7% in performance, supporting the 'Centaur' approach amid revelations of AI's 'jagged' capabilities in legal reasoning.

items.title: New Framework for Secure and Compliant NLP in Sensitive Data Handling
items.summary: Researchers introduce a comprehensive framework for managing NLP systems across six lifecycle phases, emphasizing security, privacy, bias audits, and explainability tools like SHAP and LIME for sectors like healthcare and finance.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Xbox 360 Internal Clock Hits Date Limit Tonight
items.summary: The Xbox 360 console reaches its internal date limit on December 31, 2025, potentially causing issues, but users can take steps to prevent problems with their hardware.

items.title: Quicks Releases Everdrive GBA Pro for Game Boy Advance
items.summary: A new, more advanced version of the Game Boy Advance Everdrive called the Everdrive GBA Pro has been released, enhancing retro gaming capabilities.

items.title: DuckStation PS1 Emulator Adds GPU Revision Toggle
items.summary: The DuckStation PlayStation 1 emulator now includes a toggle option to switch between the original GPU and later revisions for improved emulation accuracy.

items.title: Sega Channel Now Available on MiSTer FPGA Platform
items.summary: The classic Sega Channel service has been implemented on the MiSTer hardware, allowing retro gamers to access original online content.

items.title: CRT Beam Emulation App Released for Windows
items.summary: A new Windows application provides CRT beam emulation through shaders, bringing authentic retro display effects to modern PCs.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
